trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Ontario
There were no other sightings in Ontario on or around March 25th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to walk my girlfriend to her car. I stopped and looked at the Moon and the 2 Planets near it. When I noticed a dim light getting brighter and brighter. It looked like a fireball, but it didn't land, it was flying in a straight line opposite of the usual flight paths, because I live near the Ontario Airport. I went inside for 10 minutes, grabbed my cellphone and went back outside. That's when I saw the second one. I tried to take pictures, but none of the pictures came out. I did get video. I reported yesterday to another and tried on this site but it would not submit
Summary: 2 Bright orange lights moving slowly towards the east
